about

I used to build real-life experiences. Nowadays I'm learning to do the same, but digitally.

After spending 10 years in the film and events industries, 2020 gave me the opportunity to discover tech.

Coding is a natural fit for me, as my passion for Project Management and puzzles have found the perfect outlet. Keen to understand better and progress faster in my learning, I enrolled in the Software Engineering Immersive Course at General Assembly.

I bring strong organisational skills, creative problem solving and a passion for delivering outstanding results. Having studied Ninpo since 2017, I learned endurance and perseverance. Working within the events industry gave me the opportunity to take part in, and deliver amazing experiences.

I want to continue bringing joy through immersive user experiences, this time digitally, no longer conditioned by set times and places.

projects

FASTival

8 days, solo project - README

FASTival was created with the intention to optimise the film festival scheduling process by making it fully digital. Full-stack application integrating the back end with a Python Django API using Django REST Framework to serve data from a Postgres database, and consumed with a separate front-end built with React Hooks.

Python, JavaScript, Django, React, React Router Dom, React Big Calendar, React Map GL, React Select, SASS, Bulma, Axios, Moment. Deployed with Heroku.

DEVERR

8 days, 3-person group project - README

Website inspired by Fiverr, with a focus on software development. I took on leading the project planning, along with building the back end with Express, Mongo and Mongoose. I also helped with building the carousel component (React Slick), home and users Index pages (React Hooks), and the favouriting functionality.

JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React, React Router Dom, React Slick, Node.js, Axios, Bcrypt, Express, JsonWebToken, Nodemon, Mongoose, MongoDB. Deployed with Heroku.

ContraDictionary

2 days, 2-person group, hackathon / pair-programming - README

Minimalist website leveraging 2 APIs (Classic English Dictionary and Urban Dictionary) to show dual definitions of words (traditional and slang).

React, Axios, SASS & two dictionary APIs: (unofficial) Google Dictionary API and Urban Dictionary API. Deployed with Netlify.

Hot Sauce Ninja

9 days, solo project - README

Space Invaders-inspired game where the player is a ninja fighting incoming food enemies by throwing bottles of hot sauce. This was both the first project from the General Assembly Software Engineering Immersive Course, and my first-ever coding project.

Vanilla JavaScript, HTML, CSS. Deployed with GitHub Pages.
